tool_description: Sends multi-factor authentication codes via SMS, email, or voice call to registered contact methods.

auth_method.description: Authentication method: sms, email, or voice

contact_info.description: Phone number or email address to send code to

message_template.description: Custom message template for code delivery

error_messages: Invalid auth method: Use sms, email, or voice only.
Invalid contact info: Provide valid phone number or email address.
Invalid code length: Must be between 4 and 8 digits.
Invalid expiry time: Must be between 1 and 30 minutes.
Account not found: Invalid account_id provided.
Delivery failed: Unable to send code to provided contact method.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many MFA attempts, wait before retrying.
usage: Specify account_id, auth_method, and contact_info. Optionally customize code_length, expiry_minutes, and message_template.

delivery_status.description: Code delivery status: sent, failed, or pending

masked_contact.description: Partially masked contact information for confirmation
